name: User updates the exercise with incorrect exercise_id

parameters.name: request
parameters.value: UpdateExerciseRequestSchema(title='New Course!', max_score=None, min_score=None, order_index=None, description=None, estimated_time=None)

parameters.name: instance
parameters.value: ValidationErrorResponseSchema(details=[ValidationErrorSchema(type='uuid_parsing', input='incorrect-exercise-id', context={'error': 'invalid character: expected an optional prefix of `urn:uuid:` followed by [0-9a-fA-F-], found `i` at 1'}, message='Input should be a valid UUID, invalid character: expected an optional prefix of `urn:uuid:` followed by [0-9a-fA-F-], found `i` at 1', location=['path', 'exercise_id'])])
